about-me.description: I am a web developer with experience in the development of web and mobile applications (Responsive). My main focus is creating intuitive and functional solutions that meet users' needs. I have over 6 years of experience in web application development using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, among others.

list-experience.title: Web Developer (Angular Semi Sr)
list-experience.description: Development of web applications with Angular and TypeScript, using agile methodologies for software development. Implementation of innovative and efficient solutions to meet clients' needs. Teamwork to ensure product delivery.

list-experience.title: Web Developer (Angular Jr)
list-experience.description: Development of web applications with Angular and TypeScript. Implementation of APIs for billing, stamps, and access control. Teamwork to ensure product delivery.

list-experience.title: Full Stack
list-experience.description: Development of a web application with the technologies Laravel, Bootstrap, Vue.js, PHP, and MySQL. The main purpose was to create a web application for inventory management.
